column1: Friends and relatives may call on the family at NEWCOMER FUNERAL HOME
column5: 2015 from 4 to 7 PM. A Vigil service will follow at 7 PM. Visitation continues Tuesday
column7: 2015 from 10 to 10:45 AM at ST. JOHN THE EVANGELIST CATHOLIC CHURCH (413 St. John Street
column8: Green Bay). A Mass of Christian burial will be celebrated at 11 AM. Entombment will be at Allouez Catholic Cemetery.
